cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to an invalid IP format '999.999.999.999' will cause network interface configuration failure and prevent AMF connection.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 15 (valid range 1-10) will cause TDD configuration validation failure and prevent frame structure setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 15（有效範圍 1-10）會導致 TDD 配置驗證失敗，並阻止幀結構設置。
